0: The room facilities were comfortable and modern
Clean compact room with every amenity and good sized bathroom
Nice option for breakfast drinks food in the lobby restaurant
nice lobby nice restaurant and decent location
Restaurant downstairs was fabulous bar was generous with their pours
The front desk was very helpful the rooms were immaculate and the lobby was great for spending time with friends in other rooms
Foyer and room very clean and modern
Room was comfortable and clean but amenities was sparse things we have had everywhere else just are not there eg robes slippers ample towels
We arrived and they reception was very fast
1: When you get past the reception area the hotel becomes very dark and gloomy all day long with dark painted walls
I think they should do something about the heat pumping all of the time and maybe have a dimmer for the hallway lights later at night
The public areas and elevators were very noisy with too loud music
The hallways smelled like cigarette smoke but the room was fine
The hotel agreed not to charge the facility fee in the end
Just had surface amenities to check it off the list as a 4star hotel
no note of room amenities construction noise opposite hotel lighting could be better
They do n’t even have a normal lobby lounge for the early arriving guests who have to wait hours for their room
The lobby is beautiful but other than that the room was run down and older than pictured
